### #{NUM_ISSUE} {PR_NAME}
---
#### Summary
- Quick Summary of what your PR adds in 1 or 2 lines.
- Why this change improves the app.
### Information for the team.
---
#### Important Changes. (optional)
- If this PR changes the behavior of certain features not obviously linked to the PR or how development should be handled, precise it here, the goal of this field is to make sure the team is aware of the most important details that they should be concerned with during the next sprints.
#### Solved issues. (optional)
- You can link here all issues resolved by this PR and how this PR resolves them, for example #163  
- You don't need to reference the main issue linked to your PR here.
### Information for the reviewer.
---
#### How to test changes.
- Instructions for the reviewer so they can play around with the new feature, not talking about tests but more how to use see this PR in effect in the app.
#### Implementation details.
- Tell the reviewer here if there is anything you think they should know about you implemented the code in your PR why you did it like you did.
#### Additional Notes.
- Anything you want the reviewer to know that doesn't fall in any of the other categories.
- If your PR is linked to a UI change, link to the description an image or video that shows the new behavior.
